net.grinder.util.thread
Class BooleanCondition

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.util.thread.BooleanCondition

public final class BooleanCondition
extends Object

Lock object that has two states. A caller can wait for the state to change to a particular value, but can also be woken by another thread.

Author:
Philip Aston

Constructor Summary
BooleanCondition()
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean await(boolean state)
          Wait for our state to match the passed value.
 boolean get()
          Query the state without blocking.
 void set(boolean state)
          Set the state to the passed value.
 void wakeUpAllWaiters()
          Wake up other threads that are waiting in await(boolean).

Constructor Detail

BooleanCondition

public BooleanCondition()
Method Detail

await

public boolean await(boolean state)
Wait for our state to match the passed value.

Parameters:
state - State to wait for.
Returns:
The new state value. Can differ from the parameter if we have been woken by another thread calling wakeUpAllWaiters().

set

public void set(boolean state)
Set the state to the passed value.

Parameters:
state - The new state.

get

public boolean get()
Query the state without blocking.

Returns:
The state.

wakeUpAllWaiters

public void wakeUpAllWaiters()
Wake up other threads that are waiting in await(boolean).
